references.paper_title: A survey of methods for time series change point detection
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of existing time series change point detection methods, which is crucial context for the presented work.

references.paper_title: Selective review of offline change point detection methods
references.reason: This review focuses on offline change point detection methods, offering a refined perspective within the broader field of change point detection, relevant to the presented research.

references.paper_title: Time series change point detection with self-supervised contrastive predictive coding
references.reason: This work directly addresses time series change point detection using self-supervised contrastive learning, providing a strong baseline for comparison and a key method to improve upon.

references.paper_title: Change point detection in time series data using autoencoders with a time-invariant representation
references.reason: This paper introduces the use of autoencoders for change point detection, offering an alternative representation learning approach that the current work builds upon and contrasts with.

references.paper_title: Curvature of random walks and random polygons in confinement
references.reason: This paper's theoretical analysis of random walks and their curvature provides the mathematical foundation for the proposed curvature-based change point detection method.
